thread.title: 2015-2017 Nissan Altima recalled to fix lock glitch: 341,000 vehicles affected
thread.title_full: 2015-2017 Nissan Altima recalled to fix lock glitch: 341,000 vehicles affected

author: Richard Read (feedback@highgearmedia.com)
title: 2015-2017 Nissan Altima recalled to fix lock glitch: 341,000 vehicles affected
text: This morning, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration announced a recall of 341,000 Nissan Altima vehicles from the 2015, 2016, and 2017 model years. The agency reports that some of those vehicles could have been improperly manufactured, and as a result, the cars' doors may unlock unexpectedly. The Altima's problem is rooted in a...
